summary: Email correspondence between legal representatives and FBI Victim Services Division regarding posting a statement for the Victims Fund related to the Jeffrey Epstein Estate. The email forwards a message containing the FBI's statement and contact information for victim specialists.

persons.name: Esq. Edwards
persons.context: Attorney from Edwards Pottinger LLC who forwarded the FBI Victim Services Division statement and included FBI Victim Services on the email.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the perpetrator whose crimes the FBI Victim Services Division is providing support for victims.

connections.description: Attorney involved in correspondence regarding victim services for Epstein's crimes.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Statement Request
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division provides a statement to be posted regarding services for victims of Jeffrey Epstein's crimes.

keyFacts: The FBI's Victim Services Division (VSD) is providing services and support to victims of crimes committed by Jeffrey Epstein.
Victims are directed to contact the FBI Victim Services Division via email or phone for support and to understand their rights.
The correspondence involves legal representatives facilitating communication between victims and the FBI's victim services.
